server.$desc: Server configuration commands for temporary voice channels.

set.$desc: Add a voice channel or alter the settings of a temporary voice channel creator.

%channel.$desc: The channel to be a temporary voice channel creator.

%category.$desc: The category temporary voice channel should be created in.

remove.$desc: Remove a voice channel from being a temporary voice channel creator.

%channel.$desc: The channel to remove from being a temporary voice channel creator.

info.$desc: Get currently configured temporary voice channel creators.

%channel.$desc: Show the specific temporary voice channel creator configuration.

set.$desc: Change the settings of the temporary voice channel when it is created.

%name.$desc: The name template of the temporary voice channel.

%limit.$desc: The user limit of the temporary voice channel.

%bitrate.$desc: The bitrate of the temporary voice channel.

%region.$desc: The region of the temporary voice channel.

%video.$desc: The video quality of the temporary voice channel.

%slow.$desc: The time user needed to wait before sending another message.
